items.sentence: Let\'s not waste time discussing things we can\'t change.
I can\'t speak French, and I can\'t speak English either.
At sea level, water boils at one hundred degrees Celsius.
You and I have never played backgammon together, have we?
I can\'t tell you how many times I\'ve thought about you.
I don\'t think Tom knows what Mary\'s favorite flower is.
Let\'s see what else we can find out about the situation.
I\'m sure Tom would appreciate it if you didn\'t do that.
Three days before my flight, I still didn\'t have a visa.
To be honest, I have a feeling this won\'t lead anywhere.
